messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hi, I am Paul, your inspirational Digital Travel Assistant. I am here to help find a travel destination and travel plan for you. When you think of holiday, what comes to mind?
I want to fly in December to a warm place, where I can go Scuba Diving and Kitesurfing
That sounds exciting! What kind of atmosphere or memories are you hoping for on your holiday?
Understood. Who will be traveling with you, and what matters most to them?
alone, sun, fun, culture, warm weather
That's great to know! Is there a destination you have always dreamed of, or a new experience you would like to try?
